component.name: DNxHD Transcoder
component.summary: Transcode videos to DNxHD/DNxHR in MOV or MXF containers

description.p: DNxHD Transcoder is a simple GTK4 application to batch transcode videos into Avid DNxHD/DNxHR codecs, targeting MOV or MXF containers. It includes options for audio bit depth, channels, frame rate control, timecode injection, and optional EBU R128 loudness normalization.
